turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a drink water from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick up from the Starbucks on 1515 New York Avenue, New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall caffe mocha with 2% and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on york avenue in new york. your drink will be ready in 5 minuters.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
